entries.meaning: The state of being in poor condition, in need of repair.
examples: The sewing machine is in disrepair.
The house had fallen into such disrepair that no agent would show it to buyers.

verbs.description: disrepair (third-person singular simple present disrepairs, present participle disrepairing, simple past and past participle disrepaired)

entries.meaning: (intransitive, rare) To get into a state of disrepair.
